content:
From: Gerwin Klein <Gerwin.Klein@nicta.com.au>
The Archive of Formal proofs is now available for Isabelle2015 at http://afp.sf.net.

The following entries have seen additional significant updates for the 2015 release:

http://afp.sf.net/entries/Refine_Monadic.shtml
http://afp.sf.net/entries/Collections.shtml

Enjoy!
Gerwin
